column1: People can help to prevent the spread of Coronavirus by washing their hands regularly.
The Chinese Government punished the doctors who first reported the outbreak of Coronavirus.
Coronavirus is a myth created by some powerful forces
column2: and the virus does not really exist.

column1: The fatality rate of Coronavirus has been deliberately and greatly exaggerated.
Coronavirus was deliberately created and spread by some powerful forces in the business world.
Coronavirus was deliberately created and spread by the US Government.
The world's largest pharmaceutical companies are deliberately delaying or hiding the development of a vaccine that could end the Coronavirus pandemic
column2: in order to drive up the price of the vaccine.

column1: Coronavirus was deliberately created and spread by the Chinese Government.
Coronavirus can be cured by drinking water to flush the virus down the throat and into the stomach
column2: where it will be killed by stomach acid.
